text: Locarno is a district of the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. == Circles and municipalities == The district of Locarno has 40 municipalities divided in 7 circles: * circles of Locarno: Locarno, Orselina, Tegna, Verscio, Cavigliano; * circles of the Isole: Ascona, Brissago, Ronco sopra Ascona; * circles of Onsernone: Comologno, Auressio, Berzona, Crana, Loco, Mosogno, Russo, Vergeletto; * circles of the Gambarogno: Magadino, Casenzano, Caviano, Contone, Gerra (Gambarogno), Indemini, Piazzogna, , Sant'Abbondio, Vairano, Vira (Gambarogno); * circles of Melezza: Borgnone, Intragna, Palagnedra, Losone; * circles of Navegna: Tenero-Contra, Minusio, Mergoscia, Brione sopra Minusio, Gordola, Cugnasco; * circles of Verzasca: Lavertezzo, Vogorno, Corippo, Brione-Gerra, Frasco, Sonogno. Category:Locarno District
title: Locarno District
